title: Land for Sale in Battaramulla
details:
Land for Sale in Pahalawela Road [Off Japan Sri Lanka Friendship Road]

Highlights
- Land extent: c. 35.43 Perches
- Property is located on Pahalawela Road, Battaramulla.
- The property is accessible via a 20 foot wide access road.
- Access via Japan Sri Lanka Friendship Road [500 meters away]
- Access via Parliament Road [500 meters away]

Details
- Bare land.
- Water & electricity accessible.
- Clear title.
